Articles.Content:
Got tired of building the same single and multi stage rockets, so I tried a slightly different approach.

Sooner or later we are going to need a ship capable of cruising the kerbal star system.

And that has to get in orbit.

So, i built a huge space ship and tried to get it in orbit without using to much of its own engine power/fuel.

Failed at conserving fuel of course :-[...

...but we still have a huge ship in orbit that can be refueled (once such a feature is in the game) and prepared to explore the void 8)
Silly koose, true cruisers will be constructed in space. That is, when it\'s possible... :/

=O I have a ship exactly like that one!

Only difference is that it has a base made entirely made of a huge bank of SRB\'s to help it get to speed faster, need that extra early thrust while caring a payload up ;D
